short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevent distracting Trump and MAGA news from disrupting your day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Politics is exhausting and distracting. This extension helps you focus by warning you before you see a page with multiple mentions of Trump or MAGA.
